snippet.title: Enotria: The Last Song - Official Gameplay Reveal (Tokyo Game Show 2022)
snippet.description:
Jyamma Games presents the new gameplay reveal teaser for
ENOTRIA: THE LAST SONG for the first time at Tokyo Game Show 2022.

Enotria: The Last Song is an Action RPG Soulslike set in a fantasy world based off Italian folklore and culture. It is defined as a Souls-like but unlike other Souls-likes it is depicted in a world based off Italian summer colours, as Jyamma Games call it, ''Summer-Soul''.

Follow us on:
Web: www.enotriathelastsong.com
Instagram: https://instagram.com/enotriathelastsong
Twitter: https://twitter.com/enotriagame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/enotriathelastsong

#enotriathelastsong #enotria #jyammagames #gameplay #tokyogameshow2022
